PHRASE.LANG:

 This bundle contains:

 (3) Morphsuit™ - Zombie (Men)
 (4) Morphsuit™ - Pumpkin (Men)
 (5) Morphsuit™ - Vampire (Men)
 (6) Morphsuit™ - Frankenstein (Men)
 (7) Morphsuit™ - Killer Clown Black (Men)
 [#Legal]
